addMessageButtonText/toolTip: Insert a message into the context without triggering prediction
sendMessageButtonText/toolTip: Send your prompt and conversation history to the model for processing
tokenCount/hint:
The number of tokens in the message. Counted using the currently selected model's tokenizer.

Requires the model to be loaded.
messageTokenCount/hint:
The number of tokens in the message. Counted using the currently selected model's tokenizer.

Does **NOT** include an estimate of tokens in file attachments.
notes/hint: Save notes to this chat. Notes are for your reference only and are not sent to the model. All changes auto-save.
actions/loadModel/error: ðŸ¥² Failed to load the model
actions/addFile:
[Experimental] Attach a file to this message
(.pdf, plaintext, or .docx)
actions/changeRole:
Switch between User and Assistant roles.

This is useful for steering the conversation in a specific direction.

Can be used for staging 'few-shot learning' or 'in-context learning' scenarios
actions/deleteMessage/confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
actions/editMessage/cannotEditPreprocess:
Cannot edit preprocessed messages because they will be overwritten after running the preprocessor. To edit the message, either: 

 - Switch to the original message and edit it instead, or
 - Change the preprocessor so it produces the desired output.
actions/loadLastModel/tooltip:
Click to load the model that was last used with this chat:

{{lastModel}}
actions/loadLastModel/error: Failed to load last used model.
actions/clearLastUsedModel/error: Failed to clear last used model.
actions/changeToLastUsedModel/error: Failed to change to last used model.
actions/changeToLastUsedModel/tooltip:
You used a different model last time you sent a message in this chat. Click to unload the currently selected model ({{currentModel}}) and load the model that was last used with this chat:

{{lastModel}}
actions/switchToLastUsedModel/tooltip:
Click to switch to the model that was last used with this chat:

{{lastModel}}
actions/toggleViewingProcessed/currently: Currently viewing the original message. Click to view the preprocessed message.
Currently viewing the preprocessed message. Click to view the original message.
actions/toggleViewingProcessed/hint: Before a message is sent to the model, it may be preprocessed by a prompt preprocessor. Click to toggle between viewing the original message and the preprocessed message. Only the preprocessed message goes to the model.
editMessageConfirm/message: You have made changes to a message. Do you want to keep them?
tokenCount/contextOverflow: The unprocessed context is larger than the maximum token limit of the model. Depending on your Context Overflow Policy, the context may be truncated or the message may not be sent.
actions/createChatAtRoot/error: Failed to create chat at root
actions/createFolderAtRoot/error: Failed to create folder at root
userFile/noImageSupport: Model does not support image input
userFile/unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type - only images, PDFs and .txt files are supported.
userFile/maxFilesPerMessage: Maximum number of files per message reached. Cannot add more than {{files}} files.
userFile/maxFileSizePerMessage: Maximum file size per message reached. Cannot add files larger than {{size}}.
userFile/maxFileSizePerConversation: Maximum file size per conversation reached. Cannot add files larger than {{size}}.
userFile/failedToAddFile/title: Failed to add file to chat
prediction/busyModel/message: Please wait until the model finishes and try again
prediction/modelLoading: Message queued, will be sent when the model finishes loading
prediction/noModel/message: Select a model to send a message
retrieval/powerUser/intermediateStepsHid: Intermediate steps hidden. Click to expand.
speculativeDecodingVisualization/cannotC: View mode selection is disabled when visualizing draft tokens.
style/chatFullWidth/label: Expand chat container to window width
topBarActions/clearChatConfirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all messages in this chat?
noModels.indexing: Indexing model files... (this might take a moment)
noModels: No LLMs yet! Download one to get started!
